'''1.8-pre3''' is the third and the final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 28, 2014, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140829015359/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-1-8-pre-release-the-bountiful-update/|title=Minecraft 1.8 Pre-release 3 – The Bountiful Update|author=[[Jens Bergensten]]|website=Mojang.com}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.8-pre3|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|10323|Enchanted items close to the screen drop FPS.
|;dev
|51323|Water doesn't put burning silverfish out.
|61050|Fullscreen mode displays the actual game, only in much lower resolution in the corner.
|61246|OSX: Retina and {{key|F11}} Fullscreen broken.
|62066|String duplication glitch.
|66511|Creeper's new attack golem AI takes priority over avoid ocelot/cat.
|69052|Hang up when move out of 30,000,000.
|69638|Combined minecart explosions duplicating destroyed armor stands' items and creating ghost items.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 1.8-pre3 was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
